name: RMD-MP
savepath: Another big update coming your way! This update reworks many Necro Summons, adds some new uniques, a new forsaken pact, and improves various quest drop rewards. We've also made some more adjustments to XP Scaling for early and late-game to improve the overall flow. As always, the usual round of bug fixes and small improvements also made the cut. We hope you enjoy this large update and have fun with the new changes!

On January 17th at Midnight (UTC), our 24-hour celebration for our 4-year anniversary will begin. Just like our Christmas Chaos event, you can opt-in using the Special Events menu option in D2RLAN. New event-only items, highly discounted recipes and limited-time gambling options will make their appearance. We hope you to continue our evolving experience and we thank you for your continued support and passion!
